mapper.select: SELECT p.post_id, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.create_date, u.username FROM post p JOIN user_info u ON p.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY p.create_date DESC

SELECT p.post_id, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.create_date, u.username, COUNT(g.good_id) AS like_count FROM post p JOIN user_info u ON p.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN good g ON g.target_id = p.post_id AND g.target = 'POST' GROUP BY p.post_id, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.create_date, u.username ORDER BY like_count DESC

SELECT p.post_id, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.create_date, u.username, COUNT(g.good_id) AS like_count FROM post p JOIN user_info u ON p.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN good g ON g.target_id = p.post_id AND g.target = 'POST' GROUP BY p.post_id, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.create_date, u.username ORDER BY like_count ASC

SELECT p.post_id, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.create_date, u.username, COUNT(pc.post_comment_id) AS comment_count FROM post p JOIN user_info u ON p.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN post_comment pc ON pc.post_id = p.post_id GROUP BY p.post_id, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.create_date, u.username ORDER BY comment_count DESC
